base_description: Green and beige object with leaf-like extensions.
part_description: One central cylindrical body with six green leaf-shaped parts extending radially. Small circular top and base. Leaves are evenly spaced around the central axis.
internal_interaction_description: The central cylindrical body supports the leaf-shaped parts, providing structural stability. The small circular top and base help maintain the object's upright position. The radial arrangement of the leaves ensures balanced distribution around the central axis.
external_interaction_description: The object may interact with air currents, causing the leaves to move or rotate. It could be used decoratively or functionally, such as a wind spinner or garden ornament, interacting visually with observers and physically with environmental elements like wind.
